title: a truly captiviating story
review:
Your name is a captiviating animation. of to people who come from diffrent back grounds yet are tied toghether.Mitsuha Miyamizu is a highschool girl who lives in a religous town up in the mountains. But who wants more than a life in a small town. she whiches to be a handsome boy who lives in tokyo in her next life. She begins to swap lives Taki Tachibana a high school boy in tokyo. a beautiful story that blows you away and makes you want to cry.
truely amazing
